full_summary:
### Demonstration of In-Water Cleaning and Capture Systems

#### Notice Title
* English: Demonstration of In-Water Cleaning and Capture Systems
* French: Démonstration du nettoyage dans l’eau et systèmes de captage

#### Reference Number
* cb-9137-95470438

#### Amendment Number
* 9

#### Solicitation Number
* T8080-230283

#### Publication Date
* 2023-09-15

#### Tender Closing Date
* 2024-01-19, 14:00 (Eastern Time)

#### Tender Status
* Expired

#### Goods and Services Identification Number (GSIN)
* None

#### Brief Description
Transport Canada aims to safeguard Canadian waters from non-indigenous species (NIS) through marine shipping. Biofouling on vessels contributes to the transfer and introduction of NIS into Canadian waters. The purpose of this request for proposal (RFP) is to award contracts for projects that will demonstrate in-water cleaning and capture systems for commercial vessels.

#### Expected Tender Closing Date and Time
The tender closing date is January 19, 2024, at 14:00 Eastern Time.

#### Project Requirements
The successful bidder(s) will be required to demonstrate in-water cleaning and capture systems for commercial vessels. The RFP will provide detailed project requirements and scope of work.

#### Expected Timeline
The project must be completed within two years of the contract(s) award.

#### Notice Reference Number
* T8080-230283
